titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 United States Code, to increase the rates of educational assistance for members of the Selected Reserve, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend title 10 United States Code, to increase the rates of educational assistance for members of the Selected Reserve, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Increases, for months occurring during FY 2004 and thereafter, the rates of basic educational assistance for members of the Selected Reserve. Prohibits any rate increase for FY 2005 through 2007 based on cost-of-living adjustments.
